0.1.name: wordpress/featured-image-widget
0.1.description: Use this plugin to display the featured image for any post or page in your sidebar. When a featured image hasn't explicitly been set you have the option to use an image that was uploaded with the post/page. If that fails the plugin can use a random image.

0.2.name: wordpress/featured-image-widget
0.2.description: Use this plugin to display the featured image for any post or page in your sidebar. When a featured image hasn't explicitly been set you have the option to use an image that was uploaded with the post/page. If that fails the plugin can use a random image.
